website_summaries.verdict: A simple, elegant, tufted headboard of good quality. It looks and feels more expensive than its price tag, and assembly is easy.
pros: No buttons in tufts to fall off
Narrow profile stays flush against the wall
cons: Some reports of delivery snafus such as missing hardware, wrong order, damage, and signs of poorly repackaged goods

customer_reviews.title: Contains bed bugs, do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: We researched this bed and saw a few reviews of customers saying they got bed bugs upon purchasing. There were a lot of other good reviews though so we though it would still be fine. A few weeks after getting the back board we started getting bug bites, I figured it was mosquitoes because summer had just started. The bites persisted and upon inspecting the back of the headboard we found shredded bodies of bed bugs as they were growing after biting us. We contacted the company and at first they did not believe us so we had to send pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BED BUGS!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: BED BUGS LIVING IN THE CORNERS OF THIS HEADBOARD!!!! It looked great but we started waking up with welts on our shoulders. On closer inspection, we found these nasty bloodsuckers. There is no saving the headboard or our spendy comforter. AND NOW I SEE WE'RE NOT THE ONLY ONES! DO NOT BUY THIS INFESTED NASTINESS!!!!!!!!!!! Headboard photo is after trying to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: Another case of bed bugs
customer_reviews.text: BED BUGS! Everything in my apartment appears to be clear except for the headboard which is infested with hundreds of bugs and thousands of eggs. Headboard is in the trash, sheets are in the wash and exterminator is en route. I loved the look but throwing this item away was a no brainer. I wish I would've read the other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install! I'm a small gal, but was able to get the job done all by myself! Material is exactly as described, and the product you get in the mail is exactly what is expected after looking at the product photo. I've had the headboard for almost two years -- so these photos reflect how it is holding up. Purchased in July 2015, it is now June 2017 as I am writing this review. Still just as in love with it as when I purchased it! Perfect fit for my bed. Is very durable and has proven to be long lasting!
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful headboard! Looks expensive but really reasonably priced. So glad I purchased this! Easy to install & looks elegant!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in like 3 days! It was protected well during shipping also. I was impressed with the tufted fabric as it looks better than expected. All hardware was included to attach the legs to the headboard. Hardware was also included to attach it to the bed frame if needed. I had already purchased the Zinus brackets for my foldable bed frame for memory foam mattresses. Allen wrenched came with the hardware and it only took minutes to put together and attach to frame. Adds a great finishing touch. Great price for a decorative item.
customer_reviews.author: Messy Marvin.

customer_reviews.title: Great headboard for our spare room!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon Prime really sold this headboard for me. I saw it on other sites for more money and a shipping charge. When I got it I was even more impressed. It was exactly what I was looking for and is a solid piece.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: ANOTHER BED BUG INFESTED CRAPPY HEADBOARD !!!
customer_reviews.text: I was eaten alive by bed bugs with big red welts all over 60% of my body. LexMod is selling product obviously not regulated by any agency ensuring that this situation doesn't occur. One report of bed bugs would be one thing but there are better than half a dozen reports, RED FLAG! This went with a new $3000+ mattress and new bedding that is now just as much crap as the headboard. The fact that this vendor is still selling on AMAZON is inexcusable. Its been a very expensive lesson in purchasing cheaply made junk from third world countries that do not conform to regulations.
customer_reviews.author: Janeth Horwith

customer_reviews.title: BEDBUGINFESTED
customer_reviews.text: Now at first I most definitely loved this headboard, it fit my room perfectly and it was easy to assemble. BUT IT CAME WITH BED BUGS 🗣🗣
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture at an excellent price (and, no, no bed bugs)
customer_reviews.text: No, there were no bed bugs! Two other friends bought the cloth versions, too - no bed bugs. Not sure how this rumor got started or is perpetuated. Amazon would have pulled the product and/or the manufacturer- instead they continue to offer an attractive and affordable headboard! I got the grey, knowing it had a tinge of blue to it. And it does. It's not slate gray - more like a steel blue, emphasis on steel. Goes great in my guest room where there is a touch of blue in some other decorative items.
customer_reviews.author: JimNC

customer_reviews.title: Great headboard
customer_reviews.text: I love this headboard. It was easy to assemble and the quality was great. It's all I had hoped for at a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: laurahow

customer_reviews.title: terrible
customer_reviews.text: Ended up with bed bug infested headboard. Terrible and disgusting. Threw it away and still had to deal with the problem/.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Adkins

customer_reviews.title: WARNING BED BUGS!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for a simple and cheap headboard for our room. Turns out it was infested with bed bugs, had to throw out my mattress and box spring we just bought two year ago along with the headboard itself. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This headboard is EXACTLY what I wanted at a fraction of the price I was afraid I'd have to pay. Beautiful stitching and fabric, and very easy to install. Went from in the box to set up in less than 30 minutes. I've now been using this headboard for several weeks and am still really happy with it. It wobbles a bit, but I only notice if I'm leaning up against it, which I very rarely do, and even then it's not enough to remove a star. I'd buy this again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice headboard for the price. The color is as shown, and looks like linen. My husband put the legs on it, and screwed the headboard into the wall, using the holes already in the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy

customer_reviews.title: Nope - hard pass
customer_reviews.text: I was so freaked out by the other reviews stating these also had bed-bugs in them, that we didn't even bring them in the house when they arrived (I didn't read the reviews until after they were en route). I would suggest not risking it. These look almost too good to be true for the look and cost and I think that they are actually too good to be true. Pass!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn R

customer_reviews.title: As soon I got this back piece I started getting like bites. Woke up one day to find a ...
customer_reviews.text: Came with bed bugs!!! As soon I got this back piece I started getting like bites. Woke up one day to find a bed bug!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks great, legs could be sturdier.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I like the look of this headboard a lot. we attached it to the frame of the bed as the instructions said, but the legs are not very sturdy and the headboard would sway back and forth with every movement made on the bed, which got super annoying as it was quite loud every time it hit the wall, so we ended up using 4 lag screws to attach it to the wall as wall. Now that the headboard doesn't bang into the wall every time I roll over in bed I am very happy with this purchase. Just know that you will have to drill into your wall if you want to use this headboard.
customer_reviews.author: joe arnold

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great if you make a necessary fix
customer_reviews.text: Nice with a caveat. It is as it looks in the pics and is reasonably well made,. The connection to the frame is wood and as others have said wobbles. There is a decent solution for those of us renters that can't/don't want to deal with it banging against the wall. I bought rubber feet  to screw to the wood on the back of the headboard. So now the headboard sits against the wall with the rubber feet keeping it from banging ie. it's solid. So there you have it - simple solution to what would otherwise make this a non-starter
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Great headboard!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful headboard! No regrets. Depending on how high your mattresses are, there is wiggle room to raise or lower it necessary as well. Assembly couldn't have been easier either. It took about 4 minutes to attach the legs to the headboard and about 15 minutes to attach to my bed frame. It would have been easier with a second person just to hold the headboard up straight when I was trying to attach the first leg but I did it by myself and it was just fine. I did use a wrench (not provided) to tighten the bolts along with the allen wrench because I couldn't quite get it tight enough. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, but awkward to attach.
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived a day early, thanks Amazon! Packaging was slightly damaged, and one wood leg had a chip on the inner edge, luckily covered by the headboard. The padded board itself was solid, just enough cushion that it doesn't feel like a wall. We got it more for the look than comfort anyway. After assembly and attaching it looked great, although it does wobble up top, and the bolts stick out from the back even using the shortest ones. -1 star for the less than perfect condition of the legs & packaging and for the giant pain this thing is to attach to a frame. There were two of us, I don't think I could have done it alone!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy H

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE HEADBOARDS!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these headboards for our boys room and I cannot believe how beautiful they are! They look so high end and completely transform the look of the entire room. The navy blue is very deep and the fabric is gorgeous! After a super simple assembly, I literally came straight to the computer to write my review... I LOVE THEM! Highly recommend to anyone even considering these headboards.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL AND INVITING HEADBOARD!
customer_reviews.text: As a certified interior designer, I would recommend this head board to all my clients. I totally LIKE this headboard! This headboard was for my guest room. The color gray is warm and inviting. The stitching and fabric is very well made. It was easy to install to the metal bed frame. I'm very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Interior Designer & Artist

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this headboard. Installation was a breeze..(did it myself so hubby didn't have to do it after work, and all went well.) Yes, it moves a little bit, but so far it's not a problem. I considered mounting to the wall but the wall lamps above the bed would have to be moved,.. the plaster wall fixed and painted...so I mounted it to the bed frame and am happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepyjeanne

customer_reviews.title: Would Purchase Again
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I purchased two twins to trim up a spare bedroom. Neat. Tidy. Soft. Easy to assemble. They were clean (I read the previous bed bug review before purchasing, but with all the positive reviews executed, anyway). Mine were spotless and well packaged. Zero disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: B.A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headboard! Worked great on my daughter's bed
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headboard! Worked great on my daughter's bed. We ordered the frame and brackets from Amazon as well and they went together perfectly. Here are the links for the frame and brackets we ordered. The bracket we used:  and the Frame:  It looks great! So please.
customer_reviews.author: H. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous about the blue, but it is really an attractive conservative blue. The Headboard seems well made and sturdy. Attractive posts attach it to the bed. It is designed for platform beds, so we had to order headboard brackets to attach it to the Smartbase we bought, but it was worth the $20. I don't know if brackets would be needed for standard frame.
customer_reviews.author: Emmyfish

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A STEAL!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this headboard. If you're on the fence, buy it. It is awesome and super simple to put together once you figure out what you're doing. I have a 14" zinus base and attached it with the 16" zinus brackets. I put it together by myself which took about 1.5 hours because I couldn't decide on a height. I eventually decided to set it level with my mattress so you wouldn't see any gap. If you can grab a friend to help you set it up I would recommend it as I imagine it makes the building process a lot easier. But overall gorgeous headboard and amazing price!! I've included a photo. Please excuse my messy room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Nice Quality for the Money
customer_reviews.text: This item is very much just as it appears online. It's a great value and the fabric and workmanship quality is quite nice. HOWEVER, it is shipped in a simple, one ply cardboard box which is susceptible to handling / shipping damage. There is no additional protective packaging either so when our headboard arrived we discovered that the hole in the side of the box (about 6" in size) also meant there was a similar size tear in the backing material on the back side of the headboard. Amazon customer service was great about taking care of this issue, but just a word of warning. Otherwise, we're quite happy with the headboard and wish we had ordered it long ago.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell C. Barham

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but develops a smell after a while
customer_reviews.text: Overall after the purchase we were happy with it. It was relatively easy to assemble and attach it. The construction is solid. It is soft but also supportive. The looks are always subjective but in our view it presents itself well, does not look very cheap. Unfortunately after a year of use it started exuding a bad smell, something that feels like moisture or mold (it never got wet since we’ve bought it) and the smell permeates the room. You walk in into the room and the first thought is that you had a leak in the room and mold is developing. But it comes from the headboard. Once the headboard is removed from the room the smell is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This headboard was great except for the bed bugs. I'm not not kidding. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: NerdMD

customer_reviews.title: Great headboard
customer_reviews.text: Wife redecorated one of the bedrooms and the old headboard did not match, so she picked out this one. It was easy to assemble and came with bolts to attache to a thick or thin frame. Went together easily and no problems attaching to a standard twin bed frame. Looks nice and she has found that it is functional and comfortable when reading in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Linen Fabric Full Headboard Size In Gray
customer_reviews.text: Item was as described, received promptly, easy to install. Can be adjust during assembly for five different heights, you could change the height after assembly if needed,, but it would take two people to do it then. You could change out the wood supports to a thicker ones if you are handy, there only 3/4 inch by 2.5 inch, would have to drill pilot holes, maybe counter sink the bolts as well and paint them black. I'm using them as is for now. There a little wobbly with the 3/4 inch, but there okay though. It looks good, I would order it again if I needed another one.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G. Kett Sr.

customer_reviews.title: It looks great. We hung it on the wall with a ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks great. We hung it on the wall with a french cleat "picture hanger" from home depot. So installing it was super easy. We did not attach it to our bed frame at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Bed Bugs
customer_reviews.text: This product brought bed bugs into our apartment. We found hundreds in where the upholstery is stapled to the back of the headboard. We'd like a full refund for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks fantastic in my bedroom but wobbles
customer_reviews.text: I bought this queen headboard for my master bedroom. The design is very modern, and the material is soft. It also looks fantastic in my bedroom-- see adorable family picture :) My husband was able to easily assemble the headboard, and it attached perfectly to our bed frame. While I’m happy with the design and material of the headboard, the product still needs some improvements. When I sit against the headboard to read at night, I can feel the headboard wobbling behind me. We haven’t been able to figure out any solution to stop the wobbling. If it wasn’t for the wobble, I would absolutely give this headboard a five star review.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: This headboard is lovely and the fabric was much better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This headboard is lovely and the fabric was much better than I expected. It assembled quickly and I was able to adjust it to fit the metal frame and height of our pillow top mattress in the guest room. It came quickly and was packaged very well. There was a green piece of rope attached to the hardware in the box so don't miss it. I almost threw it out with the box. Nice product, especially for the price. If you can mount it to a wall, it will be a little more sturdy, but it still held well for our bedroom set up. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Multiple red & black stains on white headboard
customer_reviews.text: This came with a bright red stain that looked like spaghetti sauce in the top center of the headboard and several black stains on the bottom right. I attached pictures of both. The black stains would've been hidden by pillows, but I couldn't hide the red stain at all since it was at the top of the headboard. Oh, and this took a while to deliver AND was 2 days late. Now I have to somehow package this thing back up to return. I don't recommend at all!!
customer_reviews.author: stacie Lebow-Schuko

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this headboard
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this headboard. I've been looking for a long time for something that would strike my fancy and have finally found it. Yay! Our bedroom is small and we needed to remove our old headboard and footboard that was taking up so much room. This headboard is attached directly to the wall and gives us at least another foot of space, which is essential in a tiny space. Also, it has a very clean and classic look and gives the room a very calming effect.
customer_reviews.author: BESE2016

customer_reviews.title: Modern looking stable piece
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my guest bedroom. We needed a headboard for quite some time. I took a chance because of the price point. The linen look is modern and it keeps the bed from moving around like it used too. I don't quite understand the other reviews regarding the wood frame, it seemed like a quality piece for the $. It does wobble slightly if you pull the bed off the wall and purposely shake it. Overall it is a stable piece. I fit my frame perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa's Closet

customer_reviews.title: Love this headboard!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and added just the right finishing touch to my bed. Beautiful, simple and excellent quality .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stinks. Literally smells bad (previous one I bought had no problem)
customer_reviews.text: We had bought one of these before for another bed and did not have this problem. This one smells so strong. For the first week we slept in another bedroom. For the next several weeks I took it off and put it in the garage. For the last week it is back on the bed but the smell is still quite evident even with the windows open constantly. Not sure what is different / wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: George Sopp

customer_reviews.title: Classy, elegantly simple, and affordable headboards!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 of these headboards from Amazon (1 king sized & 3 queen sized), and I'm very happy with all of them.... I was concerned when I read some reviews warning of bedbugs, but I'm very happy to report that I didn't find a single bedbug in any of my headboards..... The assembly was very simple (all hardware & tools supplied), and I was able to attach each headboard without too much trouble to my metal bed frames (I did have to use wooden spacers for 3 of them, to allow for a gap between the headboard rails & the bed frames, but that was not that big a deal).... I love the simple, elegant design-- very classy!! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Semi-retired in LA

customer_reviews.title: Great Headboard!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received headboard today, three days ahead of scheduled delivery. It exceeds my expectations. Fabric is color as shown on website and a good quality. Upholstery job straight and secure. All mounting hardware and instructions were included. Originally thought of building headboard myself as I have shop and the tools, but could not have bought the materials for the price I paid for the finished headboard. Saw some comments about flimsy construction of supports, don't understand those, as support boards are good solid wood and are equal to units on more expensive bedroom sets I have. All hardware is metric sized and provided as well as Allen wrenches to tighten bolts. Would definitely recommend this product. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D

customer_reviews.title: Great headboard, adjustable height
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new headboard for my new bed and wanted something sturdy and stylish. Very happy with how it looks and feels. It came with the the bolts and tools to assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this headboard. Was an absolute breeze to put together. For those who are wondering if you have to have a frame the answer is no. I placed 50 lb anchors in the wall and used 3 inch long screws and it mounts to the wall no problem. We have a GhostBed that sits on a foundation on the floor. Looks very chic.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking headboard
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble and attach and not very heavy - I did it all by myself. The headboard is nice and doesn't feel as cheap as the price - I just wish it was slightly taller. You can adjust the height in the back, but I don't want a big exposed opening under the board. I guess this is where they save on material cost. Still a good buy though!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Color is off, and very wobbly
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the beige headboard, but what I received is more of a light bronze than a beige. I ordered beige because I thought it would go well with the colors in my room, but since this is so bronze, it actually clashes. Additionally, the headboard is noisy and thumps against my wall whenever either of us moves. It arrived with the paint on the legs scraped off along the edges. Am deciding if it's worth the hassle to return or not.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This headboard was exactly what I was looking for, and once delivered was exactly as seller described. I think I need to move the board down one notch and then it would be a tad bit sturdier. But really, it's just a great headboard! Color was perfect, fits my queen bed perfect, and is very comfortable to lean on. Very happy with this purchase and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Martin

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully Designed!
customer_reviews.text: The headboard arrived thoroughly packaged to avoid any damage. The shade of ivory is perfect and actually blends with the bedroom wall color. Used french cleats to mount on wall and there is no movement of the headboard, soft enough to lean on while watching tv.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Great headboard for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great headboard, color is exactly what is pictured, we were really concerned by some earlier reviews regarding bedbugs. We checked the board thoroughly under the sunlight, no bugs of any kind, no odor either. All hardwares are included, no missing items. It takes two people to assemble the headboard, but it is well worth the time. Great buy all around, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to fix up
customer_reviews.text: The only real issue was actually getting it from the post office (the package could not be left at the door since it was so big!) into the car and then up to my apartment on the second floor. The weight of the complete package is 12 kg including the bars, the headboard and the screws which come with it. Pretty easy to fix up. The instructions are pretty helpful. I ordered a queen size for my queen-size bed and it fits well. Whether or not it is worth the 98$ I paid remains to be seen in the next 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Pranjali S.

customer_reviews.title: Looks better then I expected
customer_reviews.text: We had no idea you could attach a headboard to a Hollywood bed frame: but found ourselves in need now that our new house has a window where the bed goes-- and upon searching found this product. Simple install, easy instructions, sufficient hardware provided, and looks way less cheap then it actually costs! Always a win! We've had it on the bed about 3 weeks now and seems to work perfectly- I will say maybe tiny bit more wobbly then I expected, not bad by any means but not 100 percent solid as I would feel most comfortable with. All in all great purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Argetsinger

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this headboard
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this headboard exceeded my expectations. I love the color, texture and quality. We only had to attach the legs onto the headboard. It was really simple. This was one of 3 headboards I ordered and they are all great! The one I bought is a very nice quality linen fabric. I bought the camel/beige color and I love it! These come in fabric or vinyl. In the description it will say linen (which is the fabric) or vinyl (which is a type of imitation leather).
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I've had this headboard for 4 years now and for the price it's kinda unreal. Good quality. Looks brand new still and I'm moving soon but will be taking this headboard and putting it in a new room. I will likely keep it for many more years in my guest bedroom. Very happy with this purchase and still can't believe how unbelievably inexpensive it is for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Headboard
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this headboard! The color was perfect and the instructions regarding attachment were clear and concise. I was afraid we would have to attach it to the wall, as from experience most headboards move when you lean back on them. This has not been a problem and makes sitting up in bed to read or watch T.V. very comfortable. Will recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David Simmons

customer_reviews.title: nice design!
customer_reviews.text: I liked it, I love the design. But between needing to keep it low to clear my window but tall enough to fit my mattress and frame by the time I would have put my pillows on the bed they would have covered the headboard completely. As other reviewers have mentioned, it is flimsy if not blocked against your box springs and even then it is a bit wiggly.
customer_reviews.author: Kath-a-lou

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headboard
customer_reviews.text: I put this headboard together and attached it to my Zinus frame in about 10 minutes. Super easy! For the price I’m very pleased with the look of it. My guest room needed that little extra touch without breaking the bank and this did the trick. I like the color and texture. It’s very adjustable so you can get the perfect height.
customer_reviews.author: Liz B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful reasonably priced headboard
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful headboard. I thought it might not be very well detailed, but it is. Also, got it delivered wonderfully quickly. The only problem I had was the fact that we have an adjustable bed and added brackets so we could attach the headboard. That was OK but if you want to fit the headboard so that it sits high (need that because if it sits too low you cannot see much of it when the bed is raised up). So we attached adjustable bumpers to the back of the headboard which keeps it from wobbling. I guess this is a common problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M Crowell

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this headboard
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous because even though the product looked great from the images, I thought the inexpensive price meant it wouldn’t look good. I was wrong. This headboard makes my guest room look stylish
customer_reviews.author: G. McFadden

customer_reviews.title: Very nice headboard, but not what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the queen size Lily in beige. What I received was Emily in grey. Very nice headboard, but not what I wanted. I don’t want to deal with the hassle of returning it, so I have a grey headboard I guess. Upon further inspection, turns out this headboard is king size and has NO hardware to attach the legs to it. This is probably my worst experience with Amazon ever and a complete waste of time and money!
customer_reviews.author: Kadie Kane

customer_reviews.title: Temporary upgrade for the dorm
customer_reviews.text: This was an easy way to dress up some very utilitarian furniture in a college dorm room. Wire ties worked fine to strap the legs of the headboard to the bed frame, a sturdy and temporary solution that will be easy to take down at year's end. The headboard itself is nicely made for the price. The adjustable height is nice, but I wish there had also been an option for the legs to be moved slightly in or out width-wise.
customer_reviews.author: LegoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Looks way more expensive than it was!
customer_reviews.text: Looks sharp. Upscale at a very affordable pricepoint. I was nervous bc I bought mine thru Amazon warehouse, it must have been a return or damaged package, but it was in perfect condition inside as described with all hardware included. Glad I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: AnneInTX

customer_reviews.title: For the price this is a great headboard. It's also very easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Overall like this headboard. It's very easy to install I have a queen size spring mattress on top with a zinus 14in smart base mattress foundation. You need to pick up the Zinus headboard bracket if you want to install this. It took about 15 minutes or so to get everything installed. Headboard came in a much smaller box than i thought. Also came in before the ship date!
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Overall very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: The headboard is well manufactured. No split seams or dented wood on the legs. It's very simple to put together. The legs do not come attached to the headboard but that was expected. I have zero complaints about this. We purchased two others in smaller sizes for our kiddos as they needed headboards. I will add that if you are using a platform bed(no boxspring/mattress lays directly on frame) which is made for memory foam mattresses then special brackets are needed to attach the headboards to the frame. Overall very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: C&A

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing error on mine.
customer_reviews.text: Okay this is a simple piece to add to a bed. It bolts to the bedframe with the two vertical wood pieces. These two fasten to the back of the headboard with blind nuts and two bolts each side. So I fasten one side but the other side of the headboard has no blind nuts installed! Dang, now I am screwed because I need this bed for guests soon and returning it is a huge PITA. Well I have tools and the will to get 'er done so I drill the wood after measuring and marking and use three deck screws with finish washers. Done! Let's hope the quality control of China's military hardware is no better!
customer_reviews.author: Half-fast Geezer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: This headboard shipped quickly, and it looks great in our bedroom. We ordered the cream/beige colored headboard, and it looks wonderful with our cool green walls with white trim. We have a king sized bed, and a bendable frame on wheels. The headboard is attached way at the bottom to the frame, which gives it a little movement, but not enough to be worrisome. It really adds a nice touch to our room.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ferg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect look!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, headboard is truly beautiful and had no problem whatsoever attaching it to my 18 inch metal bed platform while my mattress is also 14 in and it still looks perfect. Also I LOVE the color because it’s very neutral. The color is a mix of beige but peach and cream at the same time all very light making it soooo easy to match with whatever colors you have in the room or your bedding is. I’m extremely happy with my choice and it looks better than the pic on Amazon. Don’t hesitate getting it!
customer_reviews.author: Elena Toma

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Headboard looks gorgeous but it is missing the hardware. I will have to go to Home Depot and find supplemental screws/washer/etc to install. Not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this headboard
customer_reviews.text: I love this headboard. We actually moved our toddler to his first big boy bed. He often lays on his stomach and rocks back and forth while trying to fall asleep, and I didn't want him hitting his head against the hard wall while he does that, so this headboard was perfect. I was worried it wouldn't be cushy enough to keep him from hurting his little head, but it totally is. It's great looking and you can't beat it for the price! Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: ResisterSister

customer_reviews.title: Might need additional hardware to install
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. It's such a simple piece but that's what makes it great. It really helped tie our bedroom together. Side note: It SAYS it comes with all the hardware you need to connect it to your bed, but take that with a grain of salt. I had to buy additional hardware for it to work for our particular bed frame. Still, I'm very happy with it and it was a great price :)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected!
customer_reviews.text: This headboard arrived and when I opened it I couldn't believe how BEAUTIFUL it is! Much higher quality than expected especially considering the amazing price! The color is even better in person, I chose the gray and would describe it as a medium"silvery" gray but just a touch of silver. The material is very high quality! My husband was busy and I was easily able to assemble it myself. I didn't realize the wooden legs would have different holes for adjusting the height but I love this feature! Overall I'm EXTREMELY happy with this item and so glad I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Product looks better than the picture. Fabric held up great during shipping. I was concerned when it first arrived as there were several tears to the box. The hardware was in the box to attach the legs to the headboard and additional hardware to attach to my existing frame. I would have given 5 stars all around but attaching to my bed frame didn’t go as quick as I would have liked. Overall fabulous product at a wonderful price!
customer_reviews.author: BJTX

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this headboard. It was super easy to set up and looks great in my room. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha S.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Simple and straightforward to assemble. The tufting is pretty nice. We're positioning the bed such that the back of the headboard is exposed, so I do wish the back had been fully upholstered. Also, with its feet on the floor, it offers limited, but sufficient, support as a backrest. However, it seems as if it were designed to hug a wall. At this price point, I'm happy enough with the materials and the design (and I'm looking into upholstering the back of the headboard, myself.)
customer_reviews.author: Gadfly-in-Residence

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful headboard! It is absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful headboard! It is absolutely perfect. I have been searching in stores and online for a king size frame or bed frame and had no luck other than things that would cost $2000. I ended up ordering a steel King base and paired it with this grey king headboard. I also found a bench to match it at a local home goods and now my bedroom looks like a luxury hotel! Was delivered in 2 days to my front door in perfect condition. You can adjust the height and it looks exactly like in the picture. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: akedy

customer_reviews.title: Great looking headboard with strong wood attachment.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and wood it solid to hold the bolts tight. Very nice looking, better than in the pics. And it's durable fabric will last for yrs. You'd pay quite a bit more for this style from any other manufacturer, searched for this one for 6 mos. Glad I kept up the search.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT. S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to our remodeled guest room
customer_reviews.text: This is very well made quality product and looks great in our remodeled guest room. It contains all the hardware need for mounting to a medal frame or conventional wooden frame. Assembly was a breeze and mounting just as easy. It has a soft grey fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Quality production
customer_reviews.text: The holes in the headboard legs did not line up with the holes in my bed frame. King size platform bed frame, and king/cal king headboard install options and neither lined up. I really love the style and look. I ended up making my own wider leg supports, and all is good.
customer_reviews.author: KarenM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Well packed, firm, and very nice considering low price. Made one myself a few years ago that cost me more but wasn’t as nice
customer_reviews.author: Andi Mcdowell

customer_reviews.title: Good enough, but less than expected...
customer_reviews.text: The materials used are cheaper than expected... Definitely not "linen," or even close (linen doesn't have a sheen to it). I'd say you get what you pay for, but after receiving the headboard I feel it's overpriced by about 30%.
customer_reviews.author: Schwa

customer_reviews.title: Arrives damaged
customer_reviews.text: I can only give three stars because they need to figure a better way to ship this item......This headboard is very attractive and modern looking. Problem is I ordered one that came badly damaged so I returned it and ordered another.....this one had a hole torn in it as well, luckily this time, it was on the back side instead of the front like the first one. It's unfortunate that you can not depend on Amazon as much as you used to..........
customer_reviews.author: P. Buchner

customer_reviews.title: This headboard was easy to install and is tall enough to go with ...
customer_reviews.text: This headboard was easy to install and is tall enough to go with a 14 inch bedframe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great modern look
customer_reviews.text: I got this to pair with a simple platform bed frame to replace an old fashioned wrought iron bed. Instead of attaching the legs that came with the headboard, I attached a French cleat to the back and mounted it on the wall. Looks nice, is sturdy, and way more comfortable to lean on than a traditional headboard!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Diaz

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend
customer_reviews.text: Darker than I would have liked but great quality for the price and sturdy. Easy to attach to your bed frame and you can lower or raise the height of the headboard depending upon what you need
customer_reviews.author: Tammy L Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Very nice headboard
customer_reviews.text: I had to review this product because another reviewer had said some negative things, none of which were true for us. The product arrived in perfect condition, with all parts clearly labeled. We assembled it in a relatively short time and it looks great in our guest room. Attaches to the metal bedframe easily. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Karin K.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, and easy setup
customer_reviews.text: This headboard is FANTASTIC. It looks great, feels sturdy, and was extremely easy to set up. The instructions were easy to follow, whether you have a wood frame or metal frame base. Two reasons it didn't get a 5 star rating, but they are fairly minor. 1. As with most brand new products, there was a chemical somewhen I opened the plastic packaging around the individual pieces. Airs out really quick, though. 2. It's pushed against the wall, but still leans back because of the baseboard. Easy fix - folded small pieces of cardboard to about 2 inches thick, and taped to the back of eachh wooden post, no moving or squeaking or hitting the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Beauchamp

customer_reviews.title: I lost a lot of sleep after getting them so who ever sold me this item i hope your happy.
customer_reviews.text: after reading the reviews a few years after buying this head board to read a lot of people got bed bugs. really pisses me off knowing that i got them too. cost me a lot of money to get rid of them. I lost a lot of sleep after getting them so who ever sold me this item i hope your happy.
customer_reviews.author: maynard w.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE my new headboard!
customer_reviews.text: My FIRST headboard of my adult life (and I'm 51 years old). I never bought a headboard before because I figured I could spend my money on other things. Wish I'd found this sooner! For less than $100 I have a really nice-looking headboard. Now my bed looks great. It took about 10 minutes to install it. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Chudwad1

customer_reviews.title: a great headboard for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely, a great headboard for the cost. Product description and color is accurate. Headboard arrived right on time! Also only took less than 30 mins to install. Tip: Make sure you research if your bed frame requires additional purchase of brackets to help assemble. (brackets are also available on amazon for $10-20)
customer_reviews.author: Sibs

customer_reviews.title: Love this headboard
customer_reviews.text: Classically tufted, great neutral color, well made using durable fabric and frame. Excellent Vendor....Delivery was quicker than anticipated. The price was excellent and included delivery. Great addition to the look of the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit
customer_reviews.text: This item came with several giant holes in the packaging, and part of the bag with the bolts was ripped open so it was missing several screws and washers. I tried it anyway and it was way too wide for my queen metal bed frame. Spent around two hours messing with it and then taking it all a part just to send it back. Headboard looked decent but everything else was awful.
customer_reviews.author: Polno

customer_reviews.title: the headboard is simple and looks nice, but installation was kind of janky
customer_reviews.text: Once installed, the headboard is simple and looks nice, but installation was kind of janky. The headboard is cheaply made, which is obvious when viewing it from the back. The two wooden poles that you attach into the pre-drilled holes are not straight so it takes some effort to get the headboard to sit evenly. The instructions are only kind of helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Case

customer_reviews.title: Finishing touch to bed
customer_reviews.text: This headboard is made really well. It was a bit of an issue with a one person installation as it was hard to judge which holes put it at the proper height. The headboard does not fit the Zinus bed frame unless you by the brackets that make installation and alignment possible!
customer_reviews.author: J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice. No issues
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for me. Didn't have any of the issues others complained about. I kind of screwed up and bought a full size and really needed a queen size, so of course I didn't expect any of the mounting holes to line up, but it was easy enough to fix. Just mounted a 1x6 onto the bed frame and then mounted the headboard to the 1x6. Easy peasy. Oh....and it looks nice too!
customer_reviews.author: AdamR

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: Exact color and very well made. Easy to put together. Love that we could choose the height!
customer_reviews.author: BIDWICKN

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Perfect finish to our new master bedroom. Good quality and value, arrived very quickly. Though it came with the bolts to attach it to a bed frame, our bed frame doesn't accommodate a headboard. I just stood it up against the wall and pushed the bed up against it. Also, the back has wooden posts, so I used command strips to further secure it to the wall. Seems pretty stable that way.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, great value
customer_reviews.text: I was going to make my own headboard when I came across this on Amazon. The price is amazing - it wasn't much more than the materials would have cost me to make a comparable headboard. Nice neutral color that goes with anything. It was easy to install (my husband did most of the work, but I helped). I have seen comparable headboards upwards of $300, so this is a terrific value.
customer_reviews.author: mp

customer_reviews.title: Super easy, great navy color, nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my boys’ room. They are nice, soft and pull the room together nicely. They are nicer than any of the cheap ones I’ve seen in retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Gryzenia, M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty and fit the 2 twin beds I put in a guest room perfectly! Attached to a twin frame I ordered on Amazon and fit great! They have extra holes in legs to adjust the height to suite your need. Love, love, love them! Lots of compliments from friends and family on how nice they look when we have company.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

product_meta.title: Modway Lily Tufted Linen Fabric Upholstered Queen Headboard in Beige
product_meta.description: Color:Beige| Size:QueenAdd elegance to your bedroom with the Modway Lily Queen Upholstered Linen Fabric Tufted Headboard. Designed with just the right amount of grace, Lily is made from fiberboard, plywood, and soft linen fabric upholstery for a construction that is both lightweight and long-lasting. Perfect for contemporary and modern bedrooms, sleep soundly with this headboard for queen beds. Lily Queen Headboard is a piece that imparts a sense of tranquility amidst an impressive backdrop of style.
feature_bullets: STATEMENT PIECE - Instantly updating the look in any bedroom, this headboard for queen beds makes a sophisticated statement in any space it sits thanks to stylish characteristics and an elegant design
FABRIC HEADBOARD - Perfect for a master bedroom or guest suite, this upholstered headboard is covered with quality polyester fabric granting a luxe linen texture all over
TUFTED HEADBOARD - Showcasing a structured pattern, the tufted design allows for a chic look. The stunning yet subtle details of this queen size headboard make it a piece that never goes out of style
SUPERIOR CONSTRUCTION - Made with durable fiberboard and plywood, this queen headboard is sturdy for night after night of peaceful use. Dense foam provides supportive comfort on this padded headboard
ADJUSTABLE HEIGHT HEADBOARD - This upholstered fabric headboard has seven height adjustable mounting positions for a customizable look that attaches to most queen bed frames

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,162 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: One year warranty against manufacturer defects.
